post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Job Profile
Advertisement number: 240978
Title: Computer software engineer (SAP BW Specialist) (NOC: 2173)  
Terms of Employment: Permanent, Full Time
Salary: To be negotiated
Anticipated Start Date: As soon as possible  
Location: Toronto Centre, Ontario (1 vacancy)
Skill Requirements:  
  Education: Some university
Credentials (certificates, licences, memberships, courses, etc.): Project Management Professional (PMP)
Experience: 3 - 5 years
Languages: Speak English, Read English, Write English
Management Systems (erp or db): SAP (FI/CO / HR / MM / OT SD)
Other Information: Requirement for one (1) SAP-BW functional specialist with Retail industry experience. IS-Retail experience is desirable but not mandatory. However Retail client experience is a must.

Employer: 3K CONSULTING (Placement Agency)

How to Apply:  By E-mail: 3k.consulting@rogers.com

Advertised until: 2003/02/28
post.title: Computer software engineer (SAP BW Specialist)
